Ratneshwar Goit Yadav () is a Nepalese politician. Yadav is a member of Provincial Assembly of Madhesh Province from CPN (Unified Socialist). Yadav was elected via 2022 Nepalese provincial elections from CPN (Unified Socialist) party list.
